thread.title: Key EF Names VP, Federal Healthcare & Energy Financing
thread.title_full: Key EF Names VP, Federal Healthcare & Energy Financing

title: Key EF Names VP, Federal Healthcare & Energy Financing
text:
Key EF Names VP, Federal Healthcare & Energy Financing July 21, 2015, 07:04 AM Related: Energy , Federal Leasing , Key Equipment Finance 
Key Equipment Finance announced it has named Toni Egan vice president, federal healthcare and energy financing. In this role, Egan will oversee the company’s federal healthcare and energy equipment finance initiatives, and seek new opportunities to deliver flexible financing solutions to government entities. “Toni has built an exceptional reputation in the financial services industry by moving up through the ranks throughout her 20-year career,” said Art Hyman, senior vice president and manager, Key Government Finance. “Toni brings both a high level of industry and federal sales expertise. Her leadership qualities and business acumen will be a great addition to our federal team as we serve our clients and grow our business.” Prior to joining Key Equipment Finance, Egan was a vice president federal finance officer for TD Equipment Finance. Previously she was vice president at Sun National Bank. She has also held positions of increasing responsibility with Insights Investments, US Bank and General Electric Capital Corporation.
